# compression

**Instance Property**

The amount of stretching applied to the mod hole pattern.

## Declaration

```swift
var compression: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

Holes in the center aren’t distorted as much as those at the edge of the image.

## Instance Properties

- **angle**: The angle of the mod hole pattern.
- **center**: The x and y position to use as the center of the effect.
- **radius**: The radius of the undistorted mod holes in the pattern.
